page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: Hazlegrove House School: Hazlegrove has about two hundred and fifty boys, and it is expanding all the time. It is a boy's school only, for ages of 8 to 13, with the choices of being a day-boy or boarder. Hazlegrove has a high standard of education teaching 8 main subjects.Boys leaving the school take scholarship or Common Entrance exams and there is a high pass rate. At Hazlegrove, buildings are being added every so often: a new Art and Craft centre has just been finished and there are plans for more classrooms and dormitories. At the moment Hazlegrove has only about two hundred and fifty boys, although there are plans to double this number in the next few years.
